table.Name: wcms_Author
table.Title: ban_to_chuc
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from WCMS_Author where Author_Type = 2 { and Author_Name <o> @Search:Author_Name } { and CHARINDEX(@Search:Author_NameFirstChar, Author_NameReflex) = 1 } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Author_ID] ,[Author_Name] ,[Author_SearchCount] ,case when [Author_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Author_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Author_ID] ,[Author_Name] ,[Author_SearchCount] ,[Author_A] from WCMS_Author where Author_Type = 2 { and Author_Name <o> @Search:Author_Name } { and CHARINDEX(@Search:Author_NameFirstChar, Author_NameReflex) = 1 } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: set nocount on select [Author_ID] ,[Author_Name] ,[Author_A] from WCMS_Author where Author_ID = @editID
table.SQL_ADD:
set nocount on
INSERT INTO WCMS_Author ( Author_Type ,[Author_Name] ,[Author_A] ,[Author_SearchCount] ,[Author_NameReflex] ) VALUES ( 2 ,{@Get:Author_Name} ,{@Get:Author_A} ,1 ,{@Get:Author_NameReflex} ) select SCOPE_IDENTITY()
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update WCMS_Author set [Author_A]= @active where Author_ID = @editID select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: set nocount on delete WCMS_Author where Author_ID = @delID select 1
